text: When they had gone seven hundred fifty furlongs12:17 a furlong is about 201 meters or 220 yards, so 750 furlongs is about 151 km. or 94 miles  from there, they made their way to Charax, to the Jews that are called 12:17 That is, men of Tob: see Judges 11:3, 2 Samuel 10:6, and compare 1 Maccabees 5:13. Tubieni.
